author: craigmcc
msg: Avoid confusing users with a double negative, by changing disableLookups
to enableLookups instead.  The default in the example config file is still
to have lookups enabled, because that is what new Tomcat users expect, but
it is easy to turn this off.

author: craigmcc
msg: Re-enable compiling and starting the Java side of the warp connector.

author: craigmcc
msg: Update the configuration docs to reflect the new "disableLookups" option.

author: craigmcc
msg: Make it possible to disable DNS lookups of the remote host name, for
Tomcat used stand-alone, even when the web app calls
request.getRemoteHost().  Lookups are enabled by default -- disable them

author: craigmcc
msg: Reflect the fact that getCookies() can return null.
